english.segment1: How did I get so far from the promises I made?. Life it seems so dark compared to yesterday. Everything I had the gift that I received. Is slipping through my hands. Now it's only make believe
english.segment2: Chorus: I'm fading away and I feel like I can't breathe. Tomorrow's gone. How long until I break?. I'm fading away and I'm trapped inside of me. Tomorrow's gone. How long until I break?
english.segment3: All the things I chose that slowly took Your place. Are laughing back at me and I can't make it go away. My life is crashing down, another tragedy. Another broken dream, now it's only make believe
